item.title: Amy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Just because you're naked doesn't mean you're sexy. Just because you're cynical doesn't mean you're cool." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "What difference does it make if the Gospel is mostly a lie? It's an engrossing story and the words of its hero are excellent words to live by, even today." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amy add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Amy add a quote by Robbins Tom
item.description: "All depression has its roots in self-pity, and all self-pity is rooted in people taking themselves too seriously" -- Robbins Tom

item.title: Amy add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Amy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amy add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Amy add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Amy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amy add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Amy add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Amy add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Amy add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
